roleset.name: become drowsy, doze, be tired
roleset.note: DROWSE-V NOTES: Corrected by Claire. (from drowse.01-v)
DROWSY-J NOTES: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to drowse.01-v. (from drowsy.01-j)

example.name: With "off"
example.text: He drowsed off to sleep for as long as ten minutes.
example.arg: for as long as ten minutes.

example.name: only arg
example.text: The patient was drowsy after being loaded with Dilantin at the time of examination
example.arg: after being loaded with Dilantin at the time of examination.
